programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a “former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility” using only the four phone calls they’ve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it’s complicated when Tina’s new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez’s undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The Dinotrux return to the crater from their travels to find that D-Structs has taken over and built a huge wall to keep them out.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The fairies are giving a big fairy flying display in Toyland. Fairy Coco is devastated when her wings disappear just before the Flying Display. Queen Sparklewings tells Noddy that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and if anybody else tries to use them it would be dangerous as they may fall and hurt themselves. Noddy immediately stars to investigate. Following all the clues, he works out that Smartysaurus found the wings after Fairy Coco took them off in the Fairy Garden. And now she's planning on flying with them! Noddy, Bumpy and Revs rush to the DinoHills to save Smartysaurus before she has a nasty accident. The big dinosaur is very excited about flying. Noddy explains that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and Smartysaurus sadly gives them back. Clever Noddy has an idea though and later that evening, at the flying display, Smartysaurus, Toyland's first flying dinosaur makes her debut – with a little help from the building crane and a big dino-harness! Noddy's saved the day again. Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.desc: Pawston is celebrating the 40th anniversary of Grandmaw and Grandpaw's Pawtomotive Garage! programme.title: Air Warriors S11
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: This episode follows the journeys of these magnificent humpbacks, from their feeding grounds to their breeding grounds, the tender moments between mother and calf, and see the dangers their calves face in their first few months, including incredible interactions with predatory killer whales. The humpbacks also face a world full of human threats, from large container ships, to the impact of seismic testing in the search for oil and gas, now threatening their very survival once more.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Often referred to as the dinosaur fish, the coelacanth occupies a unique place in the fossil record, and when it was rediscovered almost a century ago it shook the scientific community. We follow its journey to the present day, accompanying WildOceans' scientists on an expedition to uncover more of their secrets and behaviours.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: A dangerous flu is spreading throughout Berk and Toothless is it’s latest victim.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits’ attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a “former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility” using only the four phone calls they’ve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it’s complicated when Tina’s new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez’s undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Smudge tries to prove to Fox and Stick that his monster friend is real/Julio teaches Smek how to "chill out" but Smek takes it too far

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The Dinotrux return to the crater from their travels to find that D-Structs has taken over and built a huge wall to keep them out.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Arf gets a chance to run with real sled dogs when he travels with Wally and Wenda to wintry northern Canada to deliver an important package to Wizard Whitebeard, who is off watching the Northern Lights with a fellow wizard.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The fairies are giving a big fairy flying display in Toyland. Fairy Coco is devastated when her wings disappear just before the Flying Display. Queen Sparklewings tells Noddy that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and if anybody else tries to use them it would be dangerous as they may fall and hurt themselves. Noddy immediately stars to investigate. Following all the clues, he works out that Smartysaurus found the wings after Fairy Coco took them off in the Fairy Garden. And now she's planning on flying with them! Noddy, Bumpy and Revs rush to the DinoHills to save Smartysaurus before she has a nasty accident. The big dinosaur is very excited about flying. Noddy explains that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and Smartysaurus sadly gives them back. Clever Noddy has an idea though and later that evening, at the flying display, Smartysaurus, Toyland's first flying dinosaur makes her debut – with a little help from the building crane and a big dino-harness! Noddy's saved the day again. Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: A rogue species of dragon terrorizes Berk by stealing all of the metal in town.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with “glamping” gear, the kids decide they prefer Guy’s plush method of camping to Branch’s insistence on roughing it./Poppy’s the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Pawston is celebrating the 40th anniversary of Grandmaw and Grandpaw's Pawtomotive Garage! As a surprise, Tag and Paw decide to track down items to recreate the garage to look like it did when it first opened while the rest of the family distract the Grandpawrents. / Tag and Wind face off in the Lasagna Games for a chance to be Sam’s new Crew Chief. A series of lasagna-themed games will challenge their speed, fix-it skills, and leadership. But there can only be one winner.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: When Tag finds out that Pawston has a chance to host the Dogcathalon Race, she and Scooch rush around to create a movie to show why their city should host. Unfortunately everything seems to go wrong. Will Tag and Scooch be able to save their movie before time runs out? / When Tag's construction project accidentally damages Frank and Beans’ house, she invites them to stay with her family during repairs. Tag does her best to keep Frank and Beans busy so they don’t get in the Barkers’ way.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house – or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: "Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!!" Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: "Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!!" Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Magbuwag Ta Kay
programme.desc: "Magbuwag Ta Kay" (Let's Break Up, Kay) revolves around college sweethearts Roy (Rowell Ucat) and Kay (Akiko Solon), who have to come to terms of their looming breakup.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Gallen
programme.desc: An aspiring painter and a frustrated musician become instant friends but decided to end and leave everything as is just like complete strangers. What will happen if they meet again as two completely different people?

programme.title: Twilight Dancers
programme.desc: Twilight Dancers explores the the lives of Philippine's macho dancers. Thee story takes a deeper look at how three men make their living in Manila's gay district,as they work towards keeping their relationships and trust between each other

programme.title: Basta Ikaw... Nanginginig Pa
programme.desc: Enteng (Vic Sotto) has long been looking for the right girl, it seems that he doesn’t have much luck at it. Disappointed, he decides to join his cousin in Manila where he meets Selya (Rosanna Roces), his cousin’s landlady.

programme.title: War Freak
programme.desc: Jack Llamas (Cesar Montano) is a dedicated half-Chinese cop being forced to marry a woman he does not love. Liza's (Jack's girlfriend) death pushes Jack to the edge, making him extremely irritable and sometimes violent. Jack has become every inch a warfreak.

programme.title: Amalanhig: The Vampire Chronicles
programme.desc: Amalanhig are Aswangs who failed to transfer their monstrosity causing them to rise from their graves to kill humans by biting their necks.

programme.title: Video City: Be Kind, Please Rewind
programme.desc: An uninspired filmmaker (Ruru Madrid) accidentally time travels back to the 90s at a Video City store, where he meets the woman (Yassi Pressman) who will change his life.

programme.title: Baliktaran
programme.desc: A hilarious comedy about a couple switching roles to make their marriage work.

programme.title: Maria
programme.desc: When a former BlackRose cartel assassin deliberately betrays them by refusing to complete her mission, the cartel orders her execution. Unbeknownst to them, she fakes her own death and is able to create a new life of her own.

programme.title: Ang Manananggal na Nahahati ang Puso
programme.desc: A barrio lass agrees to be the subject of a man's research about aswangs. He falls for her but hides his feelings knowing that she's an aswang.

programme.title: Babe, I Love You
programme.desc: Babe, I Love You circles on the story of two individuals who have never thought that love can blossom right at the middle of their two opposite worlds.

programme.title: Sana All
programme.desc: Iyam (Meg Imperial), granddaughter of Lola Ingga, a renowned tapuey maker in the town of Adams. Iyam is about to take over their tapuey business, but the wine that she makes doesn't meet her grandma’s standard.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Patayan Files: Ang Pinakamalaking Murder Cases ng Dekada '90
programme.desc: Cheche Lazaro's Probe Archives goes in depth on the controversy behind the gruesome crimes that shocked the entire country during the 90s.

programme.title: ALF S1 E21 - Lookin' Through The Windows
programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E16 - Beware of Greeks
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: CSI S4 E05 - Fur and Loathing
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E20 - Nine Hours
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: V: The Final Battle E01 - Part I
programme.desc: The resistance group struggle to find weaknesses of the aliens they can exploit. In addition, not all the aliens feel their invasion was right, and they too work to stop the war.

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E23 - The Townie
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.desc: Get to know the intimate side of FashionTV. silk, lace and everything seductive, bringing you the best in photo shoots, fashion shows and more.

programme.title: Mana Sa Ina
programme.desc: Fidel (Robert Arevalo) is super-strict with his daughter Frieda (Rita Avila) for fear the girl would take after her harlot of a mother Carolina (Marissa Delgado). Carolina has since abandoned her husband and daughter in favor of her lover Rufino (Orestes Ojeda).

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: The Secret of Katrina Salazar
programme.desc: Her name is Katrina Salazar, a beautiful woman admired by men but sincerely loved by just one. But behind the lovely face and the pleasant countenance is a dark secret no one knows: she is a nymphomaniac.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Codename: Palaban
programme.desc: Coming from different social backgrounds and of different ideologies, this group of women are made to undergo special training course in exchange for suspended jail sentences.

programme.title: Kadenang Bulaklak
programme.desc: Three little girls were given up for adoption after their parents were killed in an accident. Vina, the oldest sister, was left behind with an aunt. She vowed that one day, she would find all her sisters and reunite her family.

programme.title: Diligan Man Ng Dugo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo is an idealistic Army Captain who believes in the government's reform programs for the people of Mindanao. In fact, he is in constant dialogue with different Muslim hardliners regarding the matter.

programme.title: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator
programme.desc: After living a life full of vices, women and violence, Boyong Mañalac decided to turn his life around and mend his ways by taking after his father, an upright police officer. Boyong Mañalac personify the ideals of integrity and service to his countrymen.

programme.title: Row 4, The Baliktorians
programme.desc: Aruy (Dennis Padilla) and Aguy (Andrew E), heirs to a 10 million fortune, on a condition that they'll able to graduate. If not, the money would go to the school with so much at stake.

programme.title: Bad Boy 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is the sequel to the highly successful "Bad Boy" that turned the young Robin Padilla into a major action star. Bombo now out of prison and trying to live a quiet life in his small farm in the province.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Kapantay ay Langit
programme.desc: Little Charina Scott played Cupid in this romantic comedy about a single mother finding another chance at love.

programme.title: Ulo ng Gang-ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A women's soccer team was created to energize an aging community. The team's top striker has built strong friendships with older neighbors. But now that player might have another goal in mind.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #37 The TV won't turn on... / To explain that you are having a problem with something, say the name of something, then the particle "ga," and the verb in the negative form followed by "n desu ga."

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Sing for Ukraine, Sing for Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russia's invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.desc: 1 in 45 Japanese are suspected of a gambling addiction. We follow a man who made a clean break from gambling, overcoming the crisis of a broken family, and is in the recovery process from addiction.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Excessive use of short words is hampering children's ability to express their feelings, and may be linked to school violence and crime. We look at how emotional literacy training can solve this issue.

programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 2
programme.desc: Clark and Chrissy both notice a small crack in Lois’ game face. Meanwhile, Sarah and Jordan have an awkward encounter. Lastly, Lana receives a panicked phone call.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 3
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 4
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori look to cash in on their first big trip to New Orleans, but the locals are hungering for a fight. Then, the Taylor Brothers wage war to win a locker loaded with hunting and sporting equipment. What no one knows is that hidden beneaththe fishing poles, bear traps and camping gear is the score of a lifetime. And later, fireworks explode when a locker full of liquor and rare Mardi Gras masks spark a do or die bidding war.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 17
programme.desc: After a terrible date, Raj vows to never leave his apartment again. Meanwhile, Penny actually impresses Sheldon with her acting skills.

programme.title: Friends S5 14
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica's relationship becomes less of a secret. Ross must prove to his boss that he's sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 9
programme.desc: A new team shakes up the competition and tests Mo's reign as 'the furniture king', while Matthew goes hard after a three-wheel adventure. Plus, an avalanche of ping pong balls causes chaos in the yard.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 10
programme.desc: The guys compete to stay undetected in a high flying challenge, force each other to do absurd tasks at a music store, and try to get a compliment on some not-so stylish outfits.

programme.title: Gangster Squad
programme.desc: A stylish retelling of how LAPD takes back their nascent city from one of the most dangerous mafia bosses of all time.

programme.title: Friends S5 14
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica's relationship becomes less of a secret. Ross must prove to his boss that he's sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 3
programme.desc: Ezekiel signs up for a buffalo hunting expedition to prove his manhood. Meanwhile, Benny teaches Prudence how to be a bandit.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 4
programme.desc: The wagon train stops in the sinful town of Branchwater, luring Ezekiel into a night of debauchery and temptation.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 9
programme.desc: A new team shakes up the competition and tests Mo's reign as 'the furniture king', while Matthew goes hard after a three-wheel adventure. Plus, an avalanche of ping pong balls causes chaos in the yard.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 69
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Dorothy
programme.desc: When a charming old Queenslander travels 800 kilometres south of the tropics to an eco-village, it needs a complete retrofit to become uber energy efficient - but will this come at the expense of its heritage?

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Coober Pedy
programme.desc: Constructing an Underground Acropolis in the South Australian Desert town of Coober Pedy is an ambitious undertaking, but when Paul's parents retire, he wants to build them the ultimate 'underground Greek Mansion'.

programme.title: The World - Episode 81
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 105
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 105
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Melissa Mackay for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 105
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Weeknight Potluck Solved
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, and Adam, Indigenous Culinary Consultant Sam May and comedian Frida Deguise help put a stop to weeknight potluck panic.

programme.title: Australian Story - Episode 14
programme.desc: The power of the personal. Compelling stories about real people that illuminate, entertain and inspire. Presented by Leigh Sales.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Coast - Coast
programme.desc: Australia is an island continent boasting nearly 35,000 kilometres of coastline. Humans come to the seaside to relax, but for tens of thousands of species that live and breed on our coast, it's a battleground.

programme.title: The Human Revolution - Horizons
programme.desc: Trace our journey out of Africa and beyond. Along the way we established civilizations and diverse cultures. Cutting edge science reveals how we changed the planet and even ourselves. (Final)

programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Wayne's digital use has led him down a destructive path of porn addiction and more. Carissa dreams of helping others through online connections, but she doesn't realize she needs to help herself first.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: When Toni meets Harold at a medical convention, they click and soon marry. But when money starts going missing from Toni's account, suspicion falls on Harold.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When two separate cases run cold for women who have been abducted and murdered, it takes the courage of a third unsuspecting victim to unveil a killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: When a city official is gunned down in Berryville, shocked residents are left wondering who among them is a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A woman calls 911 while her family is held hostage by armed home invaders. Police rush to rescue a woman trapped in her burning car. A kidnapper tries to steal a mother's young children at a gas station.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A young woman hides in a closet as an intruder enters her home. After a fire breaks out, two women are trapped by a wall of flames, and a woman and her daughter try to fight off an erratic carjacker.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a mother of three is found lying unconscious beneath her open, second-story window, Medical Examiner Dr. Dragovic suspects there is more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A man is arrested for driving his golf cart while intoxicated and refuses a breathalyser test. A young man with LSD and hashish learns the hard way that hanging with underage girls is a very bad idea.

programme.title: Digital Addiction

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: Murders are rare in tranquil Delta Township. So when a well-liked couple is gunned down in their home, residents are terrified — until police discover the monster accidentally left a trail of breadcrumbs.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The investigation focuses on a white guy with a white pickup truck. Ann Bryan is found murdered at the St. James Place retirement community. Despite attempts to catch her killer, the case goes cold.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Police quickly identify a suspect in the murder of a local college professor, but a bombshell piece of technology stolen from the crime scene then points them in a completely different direction.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: Curtis Reeves stands accused of murdering Chad Oulson over popcorn at a matinee movie. The defence claims he acted in self-defence—that Oulson was the aggressor.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Kerry Lyn Dalton was sentenced to death for the torture and murder of Irene "Melanie" May. And because Melanie was a meth addict with no fixed address, police did little to investigate her disappearance.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A mother, her two children and her best friend mysteriously vanish. Investigators find the family's home covered in blood but very few clues. A minute detail helps authorities track down a suspect.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A paranormal investigative team is stunned by an unsettling capture on their thermal imaging camera. A mother and daughter are profoundly moved by a particularly beautiful UFO sighting.

programme.title: La Bataille Du Rail
programme.desc: During the Second World War, many French railway workers took part in the resistance. Daily acts of sabotage, spectacular derailments: the French railway network took many actions against Nazi occupation.
